resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102914</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102914</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210013</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Explore Quadratics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen Sie Quadratische Gleichungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorez Les Équations quadratiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explore Equações quadráticas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplori Le Espressioni quadratiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνήστε τις εξισώσεις δευτέρου βαθμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explore Las Ecuaciones cuadráticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity, students can select values for quadratic function coefficients, plot and explore multiple functions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität können Kursteilnehmer Werte 
für quadratische Funktion Koeffizienten auswählen, mehrfache 
Funktionen plotten und erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité, les étudiants peuvent 
choisir des valeurs pour des coefficients quadratiques de fonction, 
tracer et explorer des fonctions multiples.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade, os estudantes podem selecionar 
valores para coeficientes quadráticos da função, traçar e explorar
funções múltiplas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività, gli allievi possono 
selezionare i valori per i coefficenti quadratici di funzione, 
tracciare ed esplorare le funzioni multiple.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα, οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να 
επιλέξουν τις τιμές για τους δευτέρου βαθμού συντελεστές 
λειτουργίας, να σχεδιάσουν και να ερευνήσουν τις πολλαπλάσιες 
λειτουργίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad, los estudiantes pueden 
seleccionar los valores para los coeficientes cuadráticos de la 
función, trazar y explorar funciones múltiples.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
FN:DR. DANIEL CHURCHILL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210013</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102914</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/explore-quadratics</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
